name: Lieutenant Romanowski
descriptions: Lieutenant Romanowski is an NCR officer stationed at the NCR sharecropper farms in 2281.

Romanowski is the man responsible for providing military protection to the farms and sharecroppers, to prevent unauthorized procurement of foodstuffs. In other words, he stops wastelanders from stealing crops.
Lieutenant Romanowski's name is a portmanteau of Roman Polanski, the director of the 1974 film Chinatown which served as inspiration to The White Wash quest.

topics.response_text: What is it, trooper? You're not assigned to my squad, as far as I know.

topics.topic_text: Why are these fields being guarded?
topics.response_text: A lot of the crops grown here support the various NCR camps in the region - McCarran, Golf, and Forlorn Hope, to name a few.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about these fields?
topics.response_text: Impressive, aren't they? You don't see anything like this outside of NCR territory, that's for sure.

topics.topic_text: Trent Bascom says he's not getting his full allotment of water.
topics.response_text: The Office of Science and Industry has carefully calculated the amount of water needed for these crops. The whole thing is handled by computer.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for Corporal White. Trent told me you'd seen him.
topics.response_text: Corporal White is currently solving the mystery of the{sarcasm}Great Water Shortage. Tried to convince me he had proof, even. I didn't buy any of it.

topics.topic_text: You haven't heard anything more from White?
topics.response_text: Haven't seen him. Serves him right if the NCR declares him AWOL.

topics.topic_text: Do you have something against White?
topics.response_text: He's a glory hound, always looking for a way to get promoted to Ranger. Thinks he's too good to be a regular trooper like the rest of us.

topics.topic_text: Crops in Westside - the apparent water shortage here can't be a coincidence, then.
topics.response_text: {doesn't get it}I... really don't see the connection.{trying to save face}Look, I'm a soldier, not a scientist. I just do my job.

topics.topic_text: The fields should be getting their full supply of water again.
topics.response_text: That's... great? So there was a problem, after all. Huh.{making excuses}Well, I'm not a scientist, so it's not my fault if I didn't see anything wrong.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the Followers of the Apocalypse?
topics.response_text: They're based out of the old fort in Freeside. They supposedly helped the NCR out at some point, but they go their own way now.
